sentences.sContent: ‘Please, Vic, come with us,’ Nancy coaxed.
sentences.sCn: “求你了，维克，跟我们一起去吧。”南希哄劝道。

remMethod.val: 妈妈哄骗 (coax) 孩子穿衣服 (coat)

words.tran: 以巧言诱哄，以甜言哄骗

trans.tranOther: to persuade someone to do something that they do not want to do by talking to them in a kind, gentle, and patient way
